questions.question: What is `box-sizing`? What are the alternatives? What is the default?
questions.answer: `box-sizing` determines what is influenced by `width` and `height` properties. `border-box` includes borders and padding (whereas the default `content-box` will not include them).

questions.question: Why do we need the `::before` and `::after` pseudo-elements?
questions.answer: These pseudo-elements control the content **inside** the tags but **before / after** the actual content. __*but why do we need them?*__‚ùå

steps.name: 2. Make multimedia responsive
steps.solution: img, picture, svg, video { display: block; max-width: 100%; }

questions.question: Why do we need `display: block`? What's the default?
questions.answer: `display: block` starts on a new line, taking up the whole width. Otherwise they default to `inline` (current line, `width` and `height` have no effect).

steps.name: 3. Make all text inherit the font
steps.solution: input, textarea, button, select { font: inherit; }
